1140690.name: King Arthur's Gold: Community Heads Pack
1140690.description:
A pack of heads created by the community, for the community!

These heads were created for a contest in mid 2019 - we received 324 individual head files, and collected the best into this pack. If this is successful we may make this a regular way to support KAG - as sales from these heads go towards keeping the game alive!



This pack contains 58 Unique heads, with male and female versions where appropriate:

  • Bucket Head
  • Blonde Viking
  • Highlands Fighter
  • Chef
  • Arrow Through Head
  • Rock Band Member
  • Conquistador
  • Duck
  • Grey Ghost
  • Brown Ghost
  • Skeleton
  • Techno Monster
  • Merchant
  • Turban
  • Haku Lei
  • Jester
  • Visor Helmet
  • Candle Hat
  • Beard
  • Derp Potato
  • Plumed Helmet
  • Crusader
  • Golden Crusader
  • Golden Feather Crusader
  • Masked Helm
  • Masked Helm With Plume
  • Masked Helm With Mohawk
  • Plumed Bucket Helm
  • Hard Hat
  • Scary Mask
  • Bandito
  • Monkey
  • Hermit
  • Old Person
  • Greek Antiquity
  • Grey Hair
  • Rasta
  • Combat Robot
  • Bounty Hunter
  • Spooky Skeleton / Fearsome Knight
  • Tiger
